title: "First Dual MD/AI Degree; Mayo's Chief AI Officer; ChatGPT Citations Pass 1K"
excerpt: "The University of Texas at San Antonio and UT Health San Antonio announced the creation of the nation's first dual degree in medicine and AI, which will combine a Doctor of Medicine (MD) and a Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence (MSAI) into a 5-year degree program, according to the university."
